name: The drought
description:
In the dystopian world of The Drought you will  discover what happens when people's access to water is cut off. 

Droughts and water shortages have been plaguing Australia for years, but the issue is coming to a culmination. Because of huge water shortages and extreme rationing, the army has taken over power and closed the water taps for water conservation. Water can now only be collected at the government water collection points, and rations are in place.Since water is barely accessible living conditions have worsened. When people’s water access is taken from them they will do anything to survive, leading to riots and a high rise in all sorts of crime.
